name: Force of Gravity
description:
Made by: Ana R. Elizondo L & Jorge A. Perez T.

A meteorite has hit the moon, and now GRAVITY IS OUT OF CONTROL! Moon shards have scattered through different biomes on earth. Your mission is to restore gravity collecting every moon shard in the different biomes shown in the map below! you will be equipped with an all-terrain suit that allows you to double jump! but you must be careful, the closer you get to your goal, the more unpredictable gravity becomes, which results in a change of position with  each gravity change!

The only reason its not in WebGL format is because it wont work with the pipeline we were working with

We hope you enjoy this game. Please give us a rate and comments please
